title: Naa Bangaaru Talli
description: A father leading a dark double life and his daughter, who's eager to pursue her studies in Hyderabad, face the tragic consequences of sex trafficking.

title: Naam Shabana
description: A fiery young woman accepts help from a spy agency to avenge her lover's murder. In return, she must prove herself as one of their top recruits.
actors: Tapsee Pannu, Akshay Kumar, Manoj Bajpayee, Prithviraj Sukumaran

title: Naan Sigappu Manithan
description: After his sleeping disorder hinders him from protecting his girlfriend, a man sets out to take revenge on the thugs who attacked her.
actors: Vishal, Lakshmi Menon, Saranya Ponvannan, Jayaprakash

title: Nacho Libre
description: When Ignacio learns of an orphanage's financial woes, he pitches in to help -- by disguising himself and joining the professional wrestling circuit.
actors: Jack Black, Ana de la Reguera, Héctor Jiménez, Darius Rose

title: Naga The Eternal Yogi
description: This documentary examines the naked yoga gurus of India whose devout spiritual practice connects them to the eternal, transcending the material world.

title: Nails
description: Recently paralyzed in a devastating car accident, Dana begins to suspect a dark and sinister force may be lurking within her hospital room.
actors: Leah McNamara, Shauna Macdonald, Steve Wall, Ross Noble

title: Naked
description: Rob's madly in love and about to be married. Unfortunately, he's also naked, stuck in an elevator and caught in a time loop.
actors: Marlon Wayans, Regina Hall, Dennis Haysbert, Loretta Devine

title: Naked Among Wolves
description: When an orphan boy is smuggled into a concentration camp, he is protected by the prisoners, but the camp's Nazi guards soon learn of his presence.
actors: Florian Stetter, Peter Schneider, Sylvester Groth, Sabin Tambrea

title: Namastey London
description: London-born Jazz loves everything Western, including her British boyfriend. But on a family trip to India, her dad promises her hand to smitten Arjun.
actors: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Rishi Kapoor, Upen Patel

title: Namour
description: Aimless valet driver Steven Bassem can't find the motivation to get a better job, even when his fractious immigrant family starts falling apart.
actors: Karim Saleh, Waleed Zuaiter, Nicole Haddad, Mona Hala

title: Nancy Drew
description: Teen private eye Nancy Drew heads to Tinseltown to investigate the murder of a movie star. But can she cut through Hollywood hype to solve the case?
actors: Emma Roberts, Tate Donovan, Max Thieriot, Josh Flitter

title: Naomi and Ely's No Kiss List
description: Naomi and her gay best friend, Ely, have been inseparable since childhood, but their bond faces its biggest test yet when they fall for the same guy.
actors: Victoria Justice, Pierson Fode, Matthew Daddario, Ryan Ward

title: Nappily Ever After
description: When a perfectionist ad exec experiences a romantic setback, she embarks on a journey of self-discovery that begins with a dramatic hair makeover.
actors: Sanaa Lathan, Ricky Whittle, Lynn Whitfield, Lyriq Bent

description: Mistakenly accused of an attack on the Fourth Raikage, ninja Naruto is imprisoned in the impenetrable Hozuki Castle and his powers are sealed.

title: Naruto Shippûden the Movie: Bonds
description: When strange ninjas ambush the village of Konohagakure, it's up to adolescent ninja Naruto and his long-missing pal, Sasuke, to save the planet.
actors: Junko Takeuchi, Noriaki Sugiyama, Chie Nakamura, Kazuhiko Inoue

title: Naruto Shippûden the Movie: The Will of Fire
description: When four out of five ninja villages are destroyed, the leader of the one spared tries to find the true culprit and protect his land.
actors: Junko Takeuchi, Kazuhiko Inoue, Chie Nakamura, Satoshi Hino

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie
description: The adventures of adolescent ninja Naruto Uzumaki continue as he's tasked with protecting a priestess from a demon -- but to do so, he must die.
actors: Junko Takeuchi, Chie Nakamura, Yoichi Masukawa, Kôichi Tôchika

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie: The Lost Tower
description: When Naruto is sent to recover a missing nin, the rogue manages to send him 20 years into the past, where he unites with his father to battle evil.

title: Naruto the Movie 2: Legend of the Stone of Gelel
description: While on a mission to return a missing pet, Naruto and two fellow ninjas are ambushed by brutal knights led by the enigmatic Temujin.

description: Naruto, Sasuke and Sakura learn they'll be protecting an actress from being hurt while making her next film, but it turns out she's a princess.

title: Nasha
description: A teenage boy becomes smitten with his new drama teacher and pursues her, despite the perilous risks of being found out.
actors: Shivam Patil, Poonam Pandey, Sheetal Singh, Vishal Bhosle

title: Natascha Kampusch: The Whole Story
description: A Viennese child who was kidnapped and held captive in a basement before escaping after eight years reveals her headline-making story of survival.

description: Dean Wormer puts the titular frat on double-secret probation, and it's up to Bluto, Flounder, Pinto and the rest of the brothers to get even.

title: National Treasure
description: Modern treasure hunters search for a chest of riches rumored to have been stashed away by George Washington, Thomas Jefferson and Benjamin Franklin.

title: Natsamrat
description: A veteran Shakespearean actor steps off the stage and into the painful tragedy of old age, facing ungrateful family and his fleeting legacy.
actors: Nana Patekar, Vikram Gokhale, Medha Manjrekar, Sunil Barve

title: Natural Selection
description: As the new kid, a shy high school senior finds himself tormented by all his peers except one. But his new friend has a dark, infectious outlook.
actors: Mason Dye, Ryan Munzert, Anthony Michael Hall, Amy Carlson

title: Naughty Jatts
description: When three different boys propose to a lively, strictly reared girl who yearns to be a performer, she agrees to marry the winner of a singing contest.
actors: Neeru Bajwa, Binnu Dhillon, Arya Babbar, Roshan Prince

title: Nayok Jamai
description: After his mother hands over a fortune to a con man promising to make him a movie star, young Tona debates whether to accept his fate or fight back.
actors: Amin Khan, Toma Mirja

title: Nazi Concentration Camps
description: Shocking footage shows Nazi concentration camps after liberation, including Buchenwald and Ohrdruf, where Gen. Eisenhower ordered local Nazis to tour.

title: Needhi Singh
description: When her friend’s rapist evades punishment from the law, a determined young woman takes revenge into her own hands in this story based on real events.

description: When a Chilean policeman vows to find and capture leftist poet Pablo Neruda, a game of cat and mouse ensues that tests both their wills.

title: Neseli Hayat
description: Burdened by troubles and caught between cultures, Riza takes a job as a mall Santa and finds that real life may not be so different from make-believe.
actors: Yılmaz Erdoğan, Ersin Korkut, Büşra Pekin, Erdal Tosun

description: Under heavy surveillance by the British, an Indian nationalist plots a bold escape that takes him to Germany and brings him face to face with Hitler.

description: A bevy of mixed martial arts fighters star in this action thriller that follows a quartet of brawlers as they prepare for a key underground event.
actors: Michael Jai White, Dean Geyer, Alex Meraz, Todd Duffee

title: New York Minute
description: When bickering teenage twins accidentally land in the middle of a criminal operation, they'll have to work together to get themselves out of trouble.
actors: Mary-Kate Olsen, Ashley Olsen, Eugene Levy, Andy Richter

title: Newness
description: Martin and Gabi try to form a relationship after meeting through a hookup app, but when boredom creeps in, they seek out an unconventional solution.

title: News from Planet Mars
description: An even-keeled divorcé takes his family's increasingly odd behavior in stride, but the insanity escalates when his unstable colleague moves in.
actors: François Damiens, Vincent Macaigne, Veerle Baetens, Jeanne Guittet

title: Next Avengers: Heroes of Tomorrow
description: Years after the Avengers made the ultimate sacrifice while battling the invincible Ultron, their teen kids are ready to pick up where they left off.
actors: Noah Crawford, Brenna O'Brien, Aidan Drummond, Dempsey Pappion

title: Next Friday
description: Streetwise Craig Jones is still rooming at his parents' house in South Central Los Angeles when he learns that his archnemesis has broken out of jail.

title: Next Gen
description: When lonely Mai forms an unlikely bond with a top-secret robot, they embark on an intense, action-packed adventure to foil the plot of a vicious villain.

description: With numbers written on a doll as their only clue, three officers of the law track down a psychotic killer, unearthing dark secrets along the way.

title: Night Fare
description: A night out in Paris quickly unravels when two friends provoke the wrong taxi driver, who's after something bigger than cab fare.
actors: Jonathan Howard, Jonathan Demurger, Fanny Valette, Jess Liaudin

title: Night Train to Lisbon
description: A Swiss professor seeks to uncover the truth about the life and death of a Portuguese poet who was dedicated to overthrowing Salazar's dictatorship.
actors: Jeremy Irons, Mélanie Laurent, Jack Huston, Martina Gedeck

title: Nights in Rodanthe
description: When a hurricane hits a coastal North Carolina inn and strands the only guest, surgeon Paul Flanner, a young woman's life changes forever.
actors: Richard Gere, Diane Lane, Christopher Meloni, Viola Davis

title: Nightworld
description: A former LAPD officer takes a job as security chief at an old apartment complex in Bulgaria, where he's tormented by inexplicable events.
actors: Jason London, Robert Englund, Gianni Capaldi, Diana Lyubenova

title: Nila
description: When a cabbie chances upon his childhood sweetheart, he tries to rekindle old feelings but finds that mature love is a more complicated matter.
actors: Sruthi Hariharan, Vicky R

title: Nise: The Heart of Madness
description: In this drama based on a true story, a psychiatrist rejects electroshock therapy to treat schizophrenia and encourages her patients to create art.
actors: Glória Pires, Fabrício Boliveira, Felipe Rocha, Simone Mazzer

description: Enter the adrenaline-fueled world of freestyle motocross rider Travis Pastrana and his buddies as they travel the globe performing outrageous stunts.
actors: Erik Roner, Jim DeChamp, Jim Dechamp, Jolene Van Vugt

title: Niyazi Gül Dörtnala
description: Seeking the formula behind a magical elixir bequeathed to him by his father, a veterinary professor gets embroiled in a mobster's horse-racing scheme.
actors: Ata Demirer, Demet Akbağ, Şebnem Bozoklu, Levent Ülgen

title: No Country for Old Men
description: A drug deal gone bad and a bag full of cash entwine an unsuspecting hunter, a veteran sheriff and a murderous hit man in the stark West Texas desert.
actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem, Josh Brolin, Woody Harrelson

title: No Entry
description: After a prank goes sideways, three buddies find their relationships  -- with women and each other -- tested in unexpected ways.
actors: Anil Kapoor, Salman Khan, Fardeen Khan, Bipasha Basu

title: No estoy loca
description: A woman enters a quirky mental health clinic after attempting suicide upon finding out her husband is having an affair with her best friend.
actors: Paz Bascuñán, Marcial Tagle, Antonia Zegers, Carolina Paulsen

title: No Filter
description: When a woman visits a Chinese doctor, she discovers her pain is due to pent-up rage, and the only cure is to fully express herself, whatever may come.
actors: Paz Bascuñán, Antonio Quercia, Paulo Brunetti, Carolina Paulsen

title: No Men Beyond This Point
description: In a future where women reproduce without male assistance and only give birth to girls, a 37-year-old is the world's youngest man.
actors: Patrick Gilmore, Kristine Cofsky, Tara Pratt, Cameron McDonald

title: No One Killed Jessica
description: This thriller tells the true story of model Jessica Lall -- who was shot dead in a restaurant -- and the campaign to bring her killer to justice.
actors: Rani Mukerji, Vidya Balan, Myra Karn, Neil Bhoopalam

title: No Reservations
description: Kate, an uptight chef, finds her life turned upside down when her sister dies in a car accident and she becomes her niece's sole guardian.
actors: Catherine Zeta-Jones, Aaron Eckhart, Abigail Breslin, Patricia Clarkson

title: Nocturama
description: After planting bombs in the streets of Paris, a group of disillusioned young people spends a tense night holed up in a high-end department store.
actors: Finnegan Oldfield, Vincent Rottiers, Hamza Meziani, Manal Issa

title: North Star
description: A trapper with Indian blood butts heads with a greedy mining boss over a rich lode of gold that's buried on sacred Inuit land.
actors: James Caan, Christopher Lambert, Catherine McCormack, Burt Young

title: Notes on Blindness
description: Based on the audio diaries of academic and theologian John Hull, this film offers an impressionistic re-creation of his slow descent into blindness.
actors: Dan Renton Skinner, Simone Kirby

title: Nothing in Return
description: A teen from a dysfunctional home in Madrid skips school to hang out with a friend and raise bail money for a shop owner who fences stolen bike parts.
actors: Miguel Herrán, Antonio Bachiller, Antonia Guzmán, Felipe García Vélez

title: Nothing to Hide
description: To spice up a dinner party, old friends agree to share every private message that pops up on their phones -- with disastrous results.
actors: Bérénice Bejo, Suzanne Clément, Stéphane De Groodt, Vincent Elbaz

title: Nothing to Lose
description: This biographical drama traces the rise to fame of controversial Brazilian evangelical leader and business titan Edir Macedo.
actors: Petrônio Gontijo, Day Mesquita, Beth Goulart, Dalton Vigh

title: NOVA: CyberWar Threat
description: Amid the ever-changing cyberwar landscape, the powerful National Security Agency is viewed with a mixture of awe and fear around the world.
actors: Craig Sechler

title: NOVA: Memory Hackers
description: Neuroscientists study the mechanisms of memory to explore a challenging idea: that memory is malleable and can be shaped by not only ourselves.
actors: Jan Maxwell

title: Numbered
description: Guided by survivors' testimonies, this documentary explores the history and meaning of the numbers tattooed on the bodies of Auschwitz prisoners.

title: Numero Zero: The Roots of Italian Rap
description: In the '90s, the explosive popularity of hip-hop music in Italy impacts the nation's character while creating a new kind of renegade artist.

title: Nymphomaniac: Volume 1
description: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac reveals a lifetime of sexual experiences to a man who saves her from being beaten in an alley.
actors: Charlotte Gainsbourg, Stellan Skarsgård, Stacy Martin, Shia LaBeouf

title: Nymphomaniac: Volume II
